TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PreviewKeyDownEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后将其命名实例`Control1`并确保与事件处理程序事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#65](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#65)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#65](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#65)]

summary.span: 使用指定的密钥初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified key.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Alt As Boolean
public: property bool Alt { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否曾按下 Alt 键。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the ALT key was pressed.

value.span: 如果曾按下 Alt 键，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the ALT key was pressed; otherwise, .

value.span: 如果该键是常规输入键，则为 ；否则为 。
